question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. score board
B. "stazenaer" logo
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "stazenaer" logo is on a green wall closer to the foreground tennis court, while the scoreboard is mounted higher and further back on the court structure, making the logo clearly nearer.
